title: Please made this an acutal emote

embed.description: i drew the new champ with a gun #LeagueOfLegends

body: So I just found this https://pbs.twimg.com/media/D6zopg6X4AA6vGX.png (I will link and the original post) and it looks perfect to be an emote in game, also it looks fun to use, as someone that plays a lot of suppot role I would like some more emotes on champs like Yuumi and Teemo.

replies.body: Riot aka Tencent aka Chinese aka Censorship aka not gonna happen

I really don't understand how you fit Fascism into it but whatever floats your boat bud..
Now, I don't think I should really respond since you already answered to yourself. China censors every thing that hints towards violence and every company has to get through a hell lot of paperwork and tests before China allowing their game to be available there. So, yes China has weird laws on this matter and that is what I am saying, just like you just said. Everything else you wrote was completely irrelevant and you just wrote it to call me Fascist without any reason. And if you want to point that finger so badly and call me Fascist, bud, you must have many fingers to point towards the millions of people that are against China's policies which I am as well
she has a gun. it would never be allowed. anything depicting weapons, drugs or violence is a no go for a f2p game like league.

Half of the characters are violent 
And all the regions are violent in some way
Noxus literally gassed ionia, Demacia basically wants to lock up or kill all mages, Zaun is all about drugs and the criminal underworld

Do i need to go on?

Yuumi already got like 3 emotes on release for some reason. Doesn't need any more.
I'd rather see emotes for champions who don't have any yet.
Hell I'd rather have literally anything besides more Yuumi content.

> [{quoted}](name=TheUrbanKitsune,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=y8PzyiBx,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-11-12T17:45:38.913+0000)
>
> Yuumi already got like 3 emotes on release for some reason. Doesn't need any more.
> I'd rather see emotes for champions who don't have any yet.
> Hell I'd rather have literally anything besides more Yuumi content.

Riot seems to be testing water with champion specific emote package of sort. When that happens, they get 3 emotes in a bundle dedicated to them.

First was Jinx I think, then there are Ezreal, Yuumi, Sylas, Neeko (the latter 3 all got it on-release) and maybe others who Riot tried with it.

It wasn't just Yuumi.

My guess is that Riot is pushing it as a standard release model, release a new champ, 1 release skin, and 3 release emote.
